title: For Teachers
description: Learn show Skole can help teachers to boost the performance of their students.
ctaSubheader1: We can help you to provide the
ctaSubheader5: for you. Let us know your interest by leaving your email below!
emailSubmitted: Thanks! We'll be in touch with you shortly.
studentsBullet3: • Access to materials from previous course instances.
teachersBullet1: • Anonymous feedback from students without intermediaries.
teachersBullet2: • Score system that activates the students.
infoBullet1: 1. Get in touch with us. We help you to get started.
infoBullet2: 2. Upload your materials or send them to us. We always clearly credit you as the author.
